edu.umn.se.trap.data
Class TripDay

java.lang.Object
  edu.umn.se.trap.data.TripDay

public class TripDay
extends java.lang.Object

The TripDay class contains all the PerDiemExpenses for one day in the trip. This is convenient for particular rules which work on a per day notion.

Author:
andrewh

Field Detail

java.lang.Integer dayNumber
Day on the trip. The first day has a day number of 1

Constructor Detail

TripDay

public TripDay(java.lang.Integer dayNumber)
Constructor for a TripDay. Initializes all internal values. Day is set to the provided number, meal expenses list created, lodging/incidental expenses are set to null and the dayTotal is set to 0.

Parameters:
dayNumber - - The number of the day in the trip this TripDay is to represnet. The first day of the trip should be 1.
Method Detail

getDayNumber

public java.lang.Integer getDayNumber()
Get the day of on the trip of this TripDay.

Returns:
- The day of the trip

getDayTotal

public java.lang.Double getDayTotal()
Get the total reimbursement amount for this day of the trip. This is only the total for per diem expenses.

Returns:
- The total for all per diem expenses on this day of the trip.

addToDayTotal

public void addToDayTotal(java.lang.Double amount)
Add to the reimbursement total for the per diem expenses on this day of the trip.

Parameters:
amount - - The amount to add for this day of the trip.

getMealExpenses

public java.util.List<MealExpense> getMealExpenses()
Get the list of meal expenses for this day.

Returns:
- The list of meal expenses for this day

addMealExpenses

public void addMealExpenses(MealExpense mealExpense)
                     throws InputValidationException
Add a meal expense to the day's list.

Parameters:
mealExpense - - the meal expense to add
Throws:
InputValidationException - When there are already 3 meal expenses set for this day.

getLodgingExpense

public LodgingExpense getLodgingExpense()
Get the lodging expense for this day. It is null if not set.

Returns:
- The lodging expense for this day

setLodgingExpense

public void setLodgingExpense(LodgingExpense expense)
                       throws InputValidationException
Set the lodging expense for this day

Parameters:
expense - - The lodging expense to set for this day
Throws:
InputValidationException - When a lodging expense has already been set

getIncidentalExpense

public IncidentalExpense getIncidentalExpense()
Get the incidental expense for this day. It is null if not set.

Returns:
- The incidental expense for this day.

setIncidentalExpense

public void setIncidentalExpense(IncidentalExpense expense)
                          throws InputValidationException
Set the incidental expense for this day of the trip.

Parameters:
expense - - The incidental expense to set
Throws:
InputValidationException - If the day's incidental expense has already been set

getAllExpenses

public java.util.List<PerDiemExpense> getAllExpenses()
Get all the expenses for this day. If an incidental or lodging expense is not set (ie null) it will not be added to the list.

Returns:
- the list of all expenses for this day
